3000 3A 00 025	 lda 2500h
3003 06 00 	 mvi B,00h
3005 0E 08 	 mvi C,08h	;assuming the number to be 8 bit 
3007 0F  	 l1: rrc
3008 D2 0C 030	 	jnc skip
300B 04  	 	inr B
300C 0D  	 	skip: dcr C
300D C2 07 030	 	jnz l1
3010 78  	 mov A,B
3011 32 10 25	 sta 2510h
3014 3E 08 	 mvi A,08h
3016 90  	 sub B
3017 32 11 25	 sta 2511h
301A 76  	 hlt
